articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Fall as Credit Woes Sap Sentiment: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian stocks slipped after shares of US regional banks tumbled on rising concerns about lending standards. Government bonds rose and gold was poised for a ninth week of gains.
articles.content:
Asian stocks slipped after shares of US regional banks tumbled on rising concerns about lending standards. Government bonds rose and gold was poised for a ninth week of gains.
